file_content.text: [This terminal contains part of the bomb plans. A personal holo message is attached.]
[Static] This is Private Suzoku. Fifth Infantry, First Battalion, and bleeding out a damn artery.
Whoever finds this--Lieutenant Piloc ordered us in here. No one else. That's why he won't call for reinforcements.
He heard a rumor about neutron detonator plans and knew whoever turned those over to command would get noticed.
We made three assaults. Same tactics. Unknown enemy. Stupid decisions.
Shoot that void-brain. Get him court-martialed. Lock him up. He threw good men... just threw us away.
